articles.title: From graduation parties to a mall, 10 mass shootings over the weekend leave at least a dozen dead and over 60 injured - CNN
articles.description: They were at places that seem safe — but nowhere in America is guaranteed safe anymore. Some of the shooting victims were at a graduation party, a nightclub, a popular entertainment district or a mall -- where a 14-year-old girl was killed.
articles.content:
They were at places that seemed safe but few spaces in America are guaranteed safe anymore.

articles.title: $1 billion shock hits crypto investors - news.com.au
